title: Volume Price Analysis (VPA) Scanner
purpose: Surface unusual volume moves relative to VWAP with OBV trend alignment.
rationale: Unusual volume plus favorable distance to VWAP and OBV alignment highlights actionable moves.

reading_guide.signal_logic: vol_z>2 AND (|close-vwap|/vwap within bounds) AND obv slope aligned

assistant_hints: Prioritize volume spikes with OBV trend support.
Use VWAP distance bounds to avoid chasing extremes.
Debounce repeated spikes in choppy sessions.
Filter thinly traded symbols to reduce noise.
beginner_summary: Highlights unusual volume moves near VWAP, aligned with OBV trend.
